sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; const About = () => { return (

Hi there, I'm _____!

This is my final Portfolio, the culmination of all of my projects in Brown CSCI1300: User Interface and User Experience. This page shows the developlemnt of my front-end skills. From utilizing hierarchy, to emphasizing learnability and usuablity. This page features projects that utilize HTML, CSS, design skills, and even CSS. Hope you enjoy and learn something along the way!



I am a current Senior at Brown University graduating in the spring of 2023. I am concentrating in Economics and Computer Science. I had previously interned at a company with a user interface and user experience that could have been improved from my point of view. Yet after taking this course I feel competent enough to provide even better peer review. Although this was my first formal education of UIUX, I did have some prior knowledge to developing a website but I believe this class was a great opportunity to experiment web page development that people may otherwise not have enough time to commit to this tasks.

Less formal things:

  • I am a fan of playing pool, basketball, tennis.
  • I code in Python and Javascript
  • I love travelling and plan to Belize and Japan next

); }; export default About;
